details.Title: Element State
details.Description: The elementState event returns an enumerated value of the current state of an agency or element. A registry is needed to enumerate the possible values returned.
details.Notes: A new entry to elementState requires an explanation of when value will be returned and how it is differentiated from other values in the registry.

entries.Description: The element is operating normally, accepting calls and events.
Applies to PSAPs only. The PSAP has indicated that it is not currently answering calls.
The element is undergoing maintenance activities and is not processing calls.
The element has significant problems and is unable to answer calls.
The element is operating normally, but is handling a major incident and may be unable to accept some kinds of calls.
The element is being taken out of service.
The element is being put back in service.
